remarks: Isomorphism H of lattice join of an element under the fiducial hyperplane with atom not under it.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-2014.)
statement:
dihjatc.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihjatc.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihjatc.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihjatc.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihjatc.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihjatc.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjatc.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihjatc.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihjatc.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihjatc.x $e |- ( ph -> ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) $.
dihjatc.p $e |- ( ph -> ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) $.
dihjatc $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` ( X .\/ P ) ) = ( ( I ` X ) .(+) ( I ` P ) ) ) $.
